title: How the Invasion of Gaza Could Start a Regional War
description:
How Iran Might Escalate the War in Gaza
Watch my videos early and ad free on Nebula (along with tons of other exclusive videos). Sign up & get a discount HERE: https://nebula.tv/johnnyharris

Switch over to a direct Nebula subscription: https://go.nebula.tv/unbundle

For the bigger context on this conflict, watch this Modern Conflicts episode exclusively on Nebula: https://nebula.tv/videos/real-life-lore-modern-conflicts-israel-and-gaza?ref=johnnyharris

The conflict between Israel and Hamas is moving to a full scale ground invasion, which could lead to a massive regional war. Because this isn’t just a war between Israel and Hamas- other countries, militaries, and militias are watching what’s happening in Gaza, and they all have their own agendas.

Check out all my sources for this video here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1wkoTRBpuMjDlFtinHlJpf26ZxQ4Tp40uzERB32Bwlrk/edit?usp=sharing
